00012 template<class DialogClass> class DialogCombo : public wxComboCtrl {
00013 public:
00014   DialogCombo(wxWindow* parent,wxWindowID id=-1) : wxComboCtrl(parent,id) {
00015     // make a custom bitmap showing "..."
00016     long bw = 14;
00017     long bh = 16;
00018     wxBitmap bmp(bw,bh);
00019     wxDC* dc = new wxMemoryDC(bmp);
00020 
00021     wxColour BGColour(255,254,255);
00022 
00023     // clear to a specific background colour
00024     dc->SetBackground(wxBrush(BGColour));
00025     dc->Clear();
00026 
00027     // draw the label onto the bitmap
00028     wxString label(wxT("..."));
00029     wxFont font = wxSystemSettings().GetFont(wxSYS_DEFAULT_GUI_FONT);
00030     font.SetWeight(wxFONTWEIGHT_BOLD);
00031     dc->SetFont(font);
00032     wxCoord tw,th;
00033     dc->GetTextExtent(label,&tw,&th);
00034     dc->DrawText(label, (bw-tw)/2, (bw-tw)/2);
00035 
00036     delete dc;
00037 
00038     // now apply a mask using the bgcolor
00039     bmp.SetMask(new wxMask(bmp, BGColour));
00040 
00041     // and tell the ComboCtrl to use it
00042     SetButtonBitmaps(bmp, true);
00043   }
00044 protected:
00045   virtual DialogClass* CreateDialog() = 0;
00046   virtual wxString GetStringFromDialog(DialogClass* dlg) = 0;
00047 
00048 public:
00049   //Overridden from ComboCtrl, called when the combo button is clicked
00050   void OnButtonClick() {
00051     DialogClass* dlg;
00052     if (GetValue()) {
00053       dlg = CreateDialog();
00054     }
00055     if (dlg->ShowModal() == wxID_OK) {
00056       SetValue(GetStringFromDialog(dlg));
00057     }
00058     dlg->Destroy();
00059     SetFocus();
00060   }
00061 
00063   void DoSetPopupControl(wxComboPopup* popup) {
00064     return;  
00065   }
00066 
00067 };
00068 
00069 class FileDialogCombo : public DialogCombo<wxFileDialog> {
00070 public:
00071   FileDialogCombo(wxWindow* parent,wxWindowID id=-1) : DialogCombo<wxFileDialog>(parent,id) {}
00072   virtual wxFileDialog* CreateDialog() {
00073     return new wxFileDialog(this, wxT("Choose File"), wxT(""),wxT(""),wxT("All (*.*)|*.*"), wxFD_OPEN);
00074   }
00075   virtual wxString GetStringFromDialog(wxFileDialog* dlg) {
00076     return dlg->GetPath();
00077   }
00078 };
